comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content: The Commonwealth War Graves Commission list following details :- Rank:Private Service No:116101 Date of Death:20/04/1917 Age:25 Regiment/Service:Canadian Infantry 7th Bn. Grave ReferenceXIX. E. 7A. CemeteryETAPLES MILITARY CEMETERY Additional Information: Son of Owen William and Ella Wills Cox, of Manchester, England. these details can be found here www.cwgc.org/search-for-war-dead/casualty/497091/COX,%20C... A photography of his grave can be found here twgpp.org/information.php?id=2101539

comment.author: 71539021@N03
comment._content: Claude is my great-great uncle. I have posted a brief biography of him over at my website. I would love to be contacted to find some details and sources on some of the information that differ from our information (enlistment date, double vs single amputation, etc.): blackboardbattlefield.com/2012/04/09/private-claude-h-cox... Thanks for sharing this. It is a great tribute.
